full_summary:
# Front End Loaders - Tender Announcement

## Tender Details
* **Tender Number**: cb-284-40363321
* **Tender Status**: Expired ( Poster should update the tender title to reflect this change)
* **Publication Date**: April 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 28, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 1, 2025
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement

## Tender Requirements
* **Quantity**: 8 Front End Loaders, configurations B, C, E, F, G, and 1 Medium Snowblower for Front End Loader, configuration E.
* **Delivery**: The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is on or before 180 days after contract award.

## Solicitation Process
* **Pre-Qualification**: Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18LOAD.
* **Document Submission**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Roxanne Grenier, Roxanne.Grenier@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (999) 999-9999

## Tenders Submissions
Please submit your tenders to the contracting authority by the tender closing date. Suppliers not meeting the tender requirements will be rejected. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Note: I left out the unnecessary details and unnecessary French text (except for translations), and made sure the output was under 400 words. I also tried to abbreviate and or omit any points that were not that important. The formatting was also improved to reflect the standard of a government tender announcement. Let me know if you need any further changes.
